name: Mega Man X Figure
description: A detailed figure of Mega Man X from the classic video game series. Ready for action with his trusty blaster.

name: Nendoroid Sailor Moon
description: A lovely Nendoroid figure of Sailor Moon. Features her iconic outfit and magical accessories.

name: Nendoroid Spider-Man
description: A Nendoroid figure of Spider-Man. Swing into action with different web-slinging poses.

name: Figma Batman
description: A highly articulated Figma figure of Batman from DC Comics. Comes with various gadgets and a bat signal.

name: Figma Overwatch Tracer
description: A detailed Figma figure of Tracer from Overwatch. Blink into battle with this poseable figure.
